name: Clearbridge Mobile
overview:
Clearbridge Mobile is a world-class development studio that builds mobile apps. Our expertise includes building connected B2C and B2B apps whether the infrastructure is new or old. Clearbridge expertise also extends behind the firewall as we have infrastructure capabilities ranging from SharePoint, .Net, Ruby on Rails, Node.JS, SQL and others. On the gaming side, Clearbridge has world-class gaming developers for iOS and Android.

We simplify the app development process for our customers by managing the entire life cycle including strategic consulting, UI/UX design, development, testing, delivery and ongoing maintenance.

Today our team is involved in building mobile apps for iOS, Android, BlackBerry, Windows Phone 7 and HTML5 for clients in verticals such as including technology, insurance, financial and health care.
